    • 私货，施工中

    私货，施工中

    \text

    Δz=z+−z- \Delta{z} = z_\text{+} - z_\text{-} Δz=z+​−z-​

    \text

    \begin{equation} \label

    r(t)=r(t,Δt)=p(t)−p(t−Δt)p(t−Δt) r(t)=r(t,\Delta{t})=\frac{p(t)-p(t-\Delta{t})}{p(t-\Delta{t})} r(t)=r(t,Δt)=p(t−Δt)p(t)−p(t−Δt)​

    \end

    \begin{equation} \label

    r(t)=Δtγ r(t)=\frac{\Delta{t}}{\gamma} r(t)=γΔt​

    drdt=1γ \frac{dr}{dt}=\frac{1}{\gamma} dtdr​=γ1​

    \end

    \begin{equation} \label

    d(Δz)dt \frac{d(\Delta{z})}{dt} dtd(Δz)​

    \end

    \text

    \begin{equation} \label

    $$\frac{d(\Delta{z})}{dt}|\text{MM} \ = \frac{dz+}{dt}|\text{MM} - \frac{dz-}{dt}|\text{MM} = -\alpha+ z_+ +\alpha_-z_-$$

    \end

    \text

    \begin{equation} \label

    d(Δz)dt∣MM=−αMMΔz=γαMMr \frac{d(\Delta{z})}{dt}|_\text{MM}= -\alpha_\text{MM}\Delta{z} = \gamma\alpha_\text{MM}r dtd(Δz)​∣MM​=−αMM​Δz=γαMM​r

    \end

    \text

    \begin{equation} \label

    d(Δz)dt∣SP=−δSPr \frac{d(\Delta{z})}{dt}|_\text{SP} = -\delta_\text{SP}r dtd(Δz)​∣SP​=−δSP​r

    \end

    \text

    \begin{equation} \label

    $$\frac{d(\Delta{z})}{dt}|\text{HG} = -(\delta\text{HG} - \nu_\text{HG}r^2)r$$

    \end

    \text

    \begin{equation} \label

    d(Δz)dt∣IV=(δIV−νIVr2)r \frac{d(\Delta{z})}{dt}|_\text{IV} = (\delta_\text{IV} - \nu_\text{IV}r^2)r dtd(Δz)​∣IV​=(δIV​−νIV​r2)r

    \end

    \text

    \begin{equation} \label

    \begin

    $$\frac{d(\Delta{z})}{dt} = \frac{d(\Delta{z})}{dt}|\text{MM} +\frac{d(\Delta{z})}{dt}|\text{SP} + \frac{d(\Delta{z})}{dt}|\text{HG} + \frac{d(\Delta{z})}{dt}|\text{IV}$$

    $$\= -\gamma\alpha_\text{MM}r-\delta_\text{SP}r+(\delta_\text{HG} - \nu_\text{HG}r^2)r +(\delta_\text{IV} - \nu_\text{IV}r^2)r

    \= -\delta{r}+\nu{r^3}$$

    \end

    \end

    \begin{equation} \label

    drdt=γdΔzdt=−γδr+γνr3 \frac{dr}{dt} = \gamma\frac{d\Delta{z}}{dt}= -\gamma\delta{r}+\gamma\nu{r^3} dtdr​=γdtdΔz​=−γδr+γνr3

    \end

    \begin{equation} \label

    δ=γαMM+δSP+δHG−δIV \delta = \gamma\alpha_\text{MM}+\delta_\text{SP}+\delta_\text{HG}-\delta_\text{IV} δ=γαMM​+δSP​+δHG​−δIV​

    \end

    \begin{equation} \label

    ν=νHG−νIV \nu = \nu_\text{HG} - \nu_\text{IV} ν=νHG​−νIV​

    \end

    \text

    \begin{equation} \label

    \begin

    V(r)=∫(−γηδr+γηνr3)dr=γηδ2r3−γην4r4. V(r)= \int{(-\gamma\eta\delta{r} + \gamma\eta\nu{r^3})dr} \\ = \frac{\gamma\eta\delta}{2}r^3-\frac{\gamma\eta\nu}{4}r^4.V(r)=∫(−γηδr+γηνr3)dr=2γηδ​r3−4γην​r4.

    \end

    \end

    η\etaη is the market resistance coefficient.

    \text

    \begin{equation} \label

    H^=−ℏ2mr2+V(r) \hat{H}= {\frac{-\hbar}{2m}}{r^2}+ V(r) H^=2m−ℏ​r2+V(r)

    \end

    Schro¨\ddot{o}o¨dinger equation

    \begin{equation} \label

    \begin

    [(−ℏ2m∗d2dr2+(γηδ2r2−γην4r4)]ϕ(r)=Eϕ(r) [({\frac{-\hbar}{2m}}*{\frac{d^2}{dr^2}}+(\frac{\gamma\eta\delta}{2}r^2 - \frac{\gamma\eta\nu}{4}r^4)]\phi(r) = E\phi(r) [(2m−ℏ​∗dr2d2​+(2γηδ​r2−4γην​r4)]ϕ(r)=Eϕ(r)

    \end

    \end

    \par where E is the eigen-energy of the financial market and ϕ(r)\phi(r)ϕ(r) is the corresponding eigen-function. Then, perform action space search by solving the QFSE.

    \par Quantumn anharmonic oscillator

    \begin{equation} \label

    Hm(λ)Ψ=−d2Ψdx2+(x2+λx2m)Ψ=EΨ H^m(\lambda)\Psi=-{\frac{d^2\Psi}{dx^2}}+(x^2+\lambda{x^\text{2m}})\Psi=E\Psi Hm(λ)Ψ=−dx2d2Ψ​+(x2+λx2m)Ψ=EΨ

    \end

    Energy term E

    \begin{equation} \label

    (E(m,n)n+1)(m+1)−(E(m,n)(n+1))(m-1)=(K0m,n)(m+1)λ (\frac{E(m,n)}{n+1})^\text{(m+1)}-(\frac{E(m,n)}{(n+1)})^\text{(m-1)}=(K_0^\text{m,n})^\text{(m+1)}\lambda (n+1E(m,n)​)(m+1)−((n+1)E(m,n)​)(m-1)=(K0m,n​)(m+1)λ

    \end

    Where E(m,n)E^(m,n)E(m,n) is the n-level energy, K0m,nK_0^\text{m,n}K0m,n​ is a constant.

    set m=2:

    \begin{equation} \label

    −d2Ψrdr2+(r2+λr4)Ψ=EΨr -{\frac{d^2\Psi_r}{dr^2}}+(r^2+\lambda{r^4})\Psi=E\Psi_r −dr2d2Ψr​​+(r2+λr4)Ψ=EΨr​

    \end

    \begin{equation} \label

    (E(n)n+1)3−(E(n)n+1)=(K0(n)3+1)λ (\frac{E(n)}{n+1})^3-(\frac{E(n)}{n+1})=(K_0(n)^\text{3+1})^\lambda (n+1E(n)​)3−(n+1E(n)​)=(K0​(n)3+1)λ

    \end

    Since:

    \begin{equation} \label

    K0(n)=(1.1924+33.2383n+56.216n21+43.6196n)13 K_0(n)=(\frac{1.1924+33.2383n+56.216n^2}{1+43.6196n})^{\frac{1}{3}} K0​(n)=(1+43.6196n1.1924+33.2383n+56.216n2​)31​

    \end

    \begin{equation} \label

    λ=∣r-12Ψ-1−r+12Ψ+1r+14Ψ+1−r-14Ψ-1∣ \lambda=|\frac{r_\text{-1}^2\Psi_\text{-1}- r_\text{+1}^2\Psi_\text{+1}}{r_\text{+1}^4\Psi_\text{+1}-r_\text{-1}^4\Psi_\text{-1}}| λ=∣r+14​Ψ+1​−r-14​Ψ-1​r-12​Ψ-1​−r+12​Ψ+1​​∣

    \end

    \par Where Ψ\PsiΨ is the wave-function indicating the probability distribution of the historical price return, r-1r_\text{-1}r-1​ and r+1r_\text{+1}r+1​ are adjacent to the r0r_0r0​, and r0r_0r0​ stands for the return with maximum probability.

    Use Gerolamo Cardano’s method to solve the depressed cubic equation:

    \begin{equation} \label

    E(n)=−q2+q24+p3273+−q2−q24+p3273 E(n)=\sqrt[3]{-\frac{q}{2} + \sqrt{\frac{q^2}{4}+\frac{p^3}{27}}} + \sqrt[3]{-\frac{q}{2} - \sqrt{\frac{q^2}{4}+\frac{p^3}{27}}} E(n)=3−2q​+4q2​+27p3​​​+3−2q​−4q2​+27p3​​​

    \end

    \par Where $$p= -(2n+1)2q=\lambda(2n+1)3[K_0(n)]^3$$
